# Savagery (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Warchief, Shedim |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain the ability to rage as a barbarian once per day. If you already have the rage ability, you can use it one additional time per day.

**Savagery Domain Spells**

**1 Spleen:** Extends the duration of rage and other morale bonuses to abilities and saves.

**2** **[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|Bull's Strength]]****:** Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 minute/level. 

**3 Pounce:** Subject gets +10 feet speed and +30 on running [[Jump (Spell)|Jump]] checks, and can make pounce attacks.

**4** **[[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]****:** You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level. 

**5** **[[Righteous Might (Spell)|Righteous Might]]****:** Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat. 

   **[[Death From Above (Spell)|Death From Above]]****:** Target gains +30 enhancement bonus to [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] and land speed, can leap and take full attack.

**6 Mass Rage:** All allies in a 30-ft. radius gain the benefits of barbarian rage.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area. 

**8** **[[Earthquake (Spell)|Earthquake]]****:** Intense tremor shakes 80-ft. radius.

**9** **[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]****:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.
